name: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy - Arsenic And Old Lace / A Night At The Opera / The Long, Long Trailer / Father Of The Bride (Full Frame)

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy - Arsenic And Old Lace / A Night At The Opera / The Long, Long Trailer / Father Of The Bride (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this movie for Arsenic and Old Lace, the rest is a bonus! If you haven't seen it, it is a must see. Hilarious! Gives a whole new meaning to dysfunctional family. HA
reviews.title: 07 March 2012

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy - Arsenic And Old Lace / A Night At The Opera / The Long, Long Trailer / Father Of The Bride (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Its a good deal when you get 4 movies on one DVD for that price.
reviews.title: 14 March 2011

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy - Arsenic And Old Lace / A Night At The Opera / The Long, Long Trailer / Father Of The Bride (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Love all these old movies! Will enjoy this collection for many years to come.
reviews.title: Great old Classic Movie!
